java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class SimplePlot
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Plots data passed in as an array of Points.

Author:
David Bahr

public SimplePlot(int preferredWidth,

Creates a plot of the suggested size, but consistent with other Java GUI components, may feel free to ignore the suggestion and create a default size that best fits the current layout manager.

Parameters:
preferredWidth - The suggested width of the plot in pixels.
preferredHeight - The suggested height of the plot in pixels.

showPlotLines

public void showPlotLines(boolean showLines)
If true, will draw a line between each plotted value. Default behavior is true.

showXValuesAsInts

public void showXValuesAsInts(boolean showAsInts)
If true, will show values along the x-axis as integers rather than decimals. Default behavior is true.

showYValuesAsInts

public void showYValuesAsInts(boolean showAsInts)
If true, will show values along the y-axis as integers rather than decimals. Default behavior is false.
